# Ignore build output
bin/
obj/
[Bb]uild/
[Dd]ebug/
[Rr]elease/
*.exe
*.dll
*.pdb
*.cache

# User-specific files
*.user
*.suo
*.vspscc
*.vssscc
*.swp
*.log
*.dbmdl
*.jfm
.vscode/
.vs/

# Node & Angular
node_modules/
dist/
npm-debug.log
yarn-debug.log
yarn-error.log

# Others
*.class
*.tmp
*.bak
*.zip
*.rar
*.7z

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db
